name: Bopper Ball
overview:
Bopper Ball was produced by Team Play in 2003.

'Bopper Ball' is a simple and exciting video redemption game. The object of the game is to rack up as many points as possible to win tickets. Points are earned by hitting moving targets. The values of the targets is determined by the changing numbers directly above them. If that wasn't challenge enough, there are six playful critters blocking the targets. Interactive sound effects, cartoon graphic, and kid friendly height 'Bopper Ball' is fun for all ages.
